title: An Exciting Movie Date!
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>Thanks for waiting. I’m sorry, did you wait long?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>No, not at all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You could’ve waited for me inside, you know....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>....Well, I’d like to meet you as soon as I can, Eli-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, thank you. Then, shall we go? Have you seen the previous movie, Dia?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I’ve seen it on DVD. I can’t imagine how they would tie this to the last one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s right. I’m really looking forward to seeing what it’s about! Hey, do you have time after the movie? There’s a nice cafe nearby.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I’m free for the entire day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Then let’s talk a bunch there. About the movie and about school idols.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
